children.string: [E14: How Is Trauma Stored In Our Body?](https://trauma.blog.yorku.ca/2021/05/e14-how-is-trauma-stored-in-our-body/) #[[trauma]]

Excerpt:: Click here to view our podcast channel! In this episode, Trauma Report writer Fatmah Jahim speaks with Dr. Pat Ogden, a pioneer in Somatic Psychology and a leading expert in working through the body to resolve trauma.
